Interface Snapshot

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SnapshotImpl

    public interface Snapshot
    Represent a snapshot persisted

    • Method Detail

      • setPacker

        void setPacker(java.lang.String key,
               DataPacker dataPacker)
        This method can be used to define packers. Packers will be used when deserializing values. If packer is not defined for a particular value, that value will be treated as an Object and serialized with ObjectPacker
        Parameters:
        key - key
        dataPacker - the data packer to use for the key

      • setValue

        void setValue(java.lang.String key,
              java.lang.Object value)
        This method can be used to set/update values into the snapshot
        Parameters:
        key - key
        value - value to add

      • setValue

        default void setValue(java.lang.String key,
                      java.lang.Object value,
                      DataPacker packer)
        Set a value along with the packer to use for serializing the value
        Parameters:
        key - key
        value - value
        packer - packer

        java.lang.Object getOrDefault(java.lang.String key,
